#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
#define no_of_chars 26
using namespace std;
int main()
{
     int t,n;
     string s;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
     int a[no_of_chars]={0};
      cin>>s;
      n=s.size();
      for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
      {
          if(s[i]>=65&&s[i]<=90)
            a[s[i]-65]++;
          else if(s[i]>=97&&s[i]<=122)
                a[s[i]-97]++;
      }
   char ch;
   int max=0;
   for(int i=0;i<no_of_chars;i++)
      {
          if(a[i]>=max)
          {
              max=a[i];
              ch=i+97;
          }
      }
      cout<<ch<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
